title.rendered: Signature Global receives national recognitions through winning prestigious Real Estate Awards

content.rendered:
When a journey begins with a right purpose and a high aim, it certainly goes a long way and creates various milestones. These lines perfectly defines one growing real estate company which is Signature Global. As per an industry report Signature Global has emerged as largest real estate player in affordable housing segment in India.

In order to recognize its contribution to the Industry, recently Signature Global (India) Limited successfully won two prestigious awards at an Industry event held at Mumbai.

The first award which is ‘Real Estate Company of the Year’ given to Signature Global. The company got this recognition for developing remarkable projects and adopting global practices in maintaining quality, safety and sustainable development.

Mr. Pradeep Aggarwal, Founder and Chairman, Signature Global is consistently playing a key role in ideation, execution and putting visionary thoughts in Signature Global and known as a key instrumental to bring forward  the pain points of Real estate industry at various appropriate platforms.  The second award bestowed to Mr Pradeep Aggarwal through which he honored as ‘Real Estate Person of the Year’ for 2022 at the Construction Week India Awards 2022.

Speaking on the occasion, Mr. Pradeep Aggarwal, Founder and Chairman, Signature Global (India) Ltd. said, “It is a proud moment for the entire Signature Global family to get this award. It is a recognition of the innovative practices followed by the company in the field of real estate and the path breaking work done by us which has not only satisfied customers but also provided a cost effective solution to the burgeoning housing problem for this income class.”

Mr. Aggarwal added further, we are 21st century real estate company with a global outlook, and nurtured with Indian values. We are known as a brand which stands for Reality, Reliability and Responsibility. We make dream homes within reach of people through affordable and mid income housing and would consistently put our efforts for providing home to the common man of our country.
